description: Fix Dockerfile issues identified during debugging. This may include correcting COPY instruction order for better layer caching (as per optimize-docker-layer-caching feature), fixing base image versions, correcting WORKDIR paths, resolving dependency installation failures, or fixing multi-stage build configuration.
title: Fix Dockerfile Build Issues
